name: Serra Coffee
description: A cozy coffee shop with mountain views, specializing in artisanal coffee and local pastries

name: Stone Art Studio
description: An art space offering soapstone sculpture workshops, a traditional craft of the region.

name: Clear Waters Trail
description: An ecological trail with waterfalls and scenic viewpoints, perfect for hiking and photography.

name: Clay Pot Bistro
description: A homemade food restaurant serving dishes in clay pots, famous for its Saturday feijoada.

name: Roots Cultural Center
description: A cultural center with exhibitions, poetry nights, music performances, and local crafts.

name: Campo Largo Winery
description: A family-owned winery offering guided tours, wine tastings, and artisanal cheeses.

name: Araucária Park
description: An urban park with trails, a playground, a lake, and many araucaria trees — the symbol of the city.

name: Ceramics Museum
description: A museum that tells the history of ceramics in Campo Largo, featuring antique pieces and workshops.
